oai_dc:dc.dc:title: "Hard rain is falling on the left side of the picture. The Chilhowee Mountains are in the background. Made from side of Rich Mountain. From old road to Cades Cove."
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Photograph taken with a 3A Autographic Kodak folding camera.
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: Albert Gordon (Dutch) Roth, 1890-1974
